valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 12 Nov 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 13 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: New low expected Dogger 999 by 0600 tomorrow. Low Viking 987 losing its identity

Wind
Cyclonic 5 to 7 becoming north 7 to severe gale 9.

Rough or very rough, occasionally high in north.
Weather
Rain then showers.
Visibility
Moderate or good, occasionally poor.
